drugs documentation
===================

Lightweight Python utilities to resolve small-molecule identifiers, fetch PubChem/ChEMBL data, and plug in custom embedding functions.

.. toctree::
	:maxdepth: 2
	:caption: Contents

	quickstart
	api/index
	tutorials/tutorial1
